00014 #ifndef ULIBDBG_CRONO_H
00015 #define ULIBDBG_CRONO_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/base/base.h>
00018 
00019 struct U_EXPORT UCrono {
00020 
00021         void start() { (void) gettimeofday(&t0, 0); }
00022 
00023         void stop()
00024                 {
00025                 (void) gettimeofday(&t1, 0);
00026 
00027                 t1.tv_sec  -= t0.tv_sec;
00028                 t1.tv_usec -= t0.tv_usec;
00029 
00030                 if (t1.tv_usec < 0L)
00031                         {
00032                         t1.tv_sec--;
00033                         t1.tv_usec += 1000000L;
00034                         }
00035                 }
00036 
00037         double getTimeStart() const { return (double) t0.tv_sec + (t0.tv_usec / 1000000.); }
00038         double getTimeStop() const  { return (double) t1.tv_sec + (t1.tv_usec / 1000000.); }
00039 
00040         long     getTimeElapsed() const                         { return        (t1.tv_sec *    1000L) + (t1.tv_usec /    1000L); }
00041         double getTimeElapsedInSecond() const  { return (t1.tv_sec * 1000000.) + (t1.tv_usec / 1000000.); }
00042 
00043 private:
00044         struct timeval t0, t1;
00045 };
00046 
00047 #endif
